sentences.en: A long peal of thunder came echoing across the sky.
sentences.cn: 缓慢的拖着尾巴的雷声也来了.

sentences.en: A peal of children's laughter flew in from outside the building, then subsided.
sentences.cn: 一阵孩子的笑声闯进楼房里来, 但是又静下去了.

sentences.en: A peal of church bells rang out in the distance.
sentences.cn: 远处响起了一阵教堂的钟声。

sentences.en: A sudden peal of bells broke the silence.
sentences.cn: 突然响起的铃声打破了寂静。

sentences.en: Bertha looked blank, and then leaning back, burst into peal upon peal of laughter.
sentences.cn: 伯莎显得呆然若失, 接着,她往后一靠, 发出一阵又一阵笑声.

sentences.en: Church bells peal while squadrons of swallows screech and dive.
sentences.cn: 当教堂的大钟隆隆鸣响时,成群结队的燕子尖叫着向下俯冲.

sentences.en: I heard a peal of merry laughter.
sentences.cn: 我听到一阵响亮的欢笑声。

sentences.en: One blinding flash after another came, and peal on peal of deafening thunder.
sentences.cn: 耀眼的闪电一道紧跟着一道, 震耳的雷声一阵尾随着一阵.

sentences.en: She let out a peal of laughter.
The bells of the cathedral rang out their loud peal.
sentences.cn: 大教堂响起了响亮的钟声.

sentences.en: The bells rang a joyous peal.
sentences.cn: 铃儿发出欢乐的叮当声.

sentences.en: The bells ring a merry peal.
There was a peal of laughter down the phone, which Harry found infectious.
sentences.cn: 电话里传来一阵响亮的笑声，哈里也不禁受其感染。

sentences.en: There was a peal of laughter.
There was a peal of thunder.
When asked, Tom shot out a sudden peal of laughtr.
sentences.cn: 当问到他的时候, 汤姆突然发出了一阵大笑.

trans.tran_cn: （声音大而持续或重复的）洪亮的响声，隆隆声，洪亮的钟声，钟乐
trans.tran_en: the loud ringing sound made by a bell

trans.tran_cn: （使）（钟等）鸣响，（雷等）发出隆隆声
